languages.text: "Это не сложно. Найдите высочайшую гору на северном континенте. Наш путь лежит туда. Гора... на деле не гора. Это и есть корабль, который мы ищем".

traits.locale_text: "Это не сложно. Найдите высочайшую гору на северном континенте. Наш путь лежит туда. Гора... на деле не гора. Это и есть корабль, который мы ищем".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."
languages.original_text: "Это не сложно. Найдите высочайшую гору на северном континенте. Наш путь лежит туда. Гора... на деле не гора. Это и есть корабль, который мы ищем".

traits.locale_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「簡単なタスクだ。北の大陸で一番高い山を探せばいい。そこが我々の目的地だ。その山は…山ではない。それこそが我らの探している船そのものだ」
languages.original_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単なタスクだ。北の大陸で一番高い山を探せばいい。そこが我々の目的地だ。その山は…山ではない。それこそが我らの探している船そのものだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这个任务应该很简单，只要找到北方大陆上最高的山脉就行了，那里就是我们前进的方向。那座山脉……并不是山脉，而是我们要找的飞船。”
languages.original_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."

traits.locale_text: “这个任务应该很简单，只要找到北方大陆上最高的山脉就行了，那里就是我们前进的方向。那座山脉……并不是山脉，而是我们要找的飞船。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Rien de plus simple. Cherchez le point culminant du continent nord. C'est là que nous allons. Voyez-vous, cette montagne n'en est pas vraiment une. C'est le vaisseau que nous recherchons. »
languages.original_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."

traits.locale_text: « Rien de plus simple. Cherchez le point culminant du continent nord. C'est là que nous allons. Voyez-vous, cette montagne n'en est pas vraiment une. C'est le vaisseau que nous recherchons. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Es una tarea sencilla. Solo necesita buscar la montaña más alta del continente septentrional. Es nuestro destino. La montaña... no es una montaña. Es la nave que buscamos».
languages.original_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."

traits.locale_text: «Es una tarea sencilla. Solo necesita buscar la montaña más alta del continente septentrional. Es nuestro destino. La montaña... no es una montaña. Es la nave que buscamos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist eigentlich nicht schwer. Sucht einfach nach dem höchsten Berg auf dem nördlichen Kontinent. Dorthin müssen wir. Dieser Berg ... ist kein Berg. Er ist das Schiff, das wir suchen."
languages.original_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist eigentlich nicht schwer. Sucht einfach nach dem höchsten Berg auf dem nördlichen Kontinent. Dorthin müssen wir. Dieser Berg ... ist kein Berg. Er ist das Schiff, das wir suchen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hiç endişelenmeyin... Kuzeydeki kıtadaki en yüksek dağı bulmanız yeterli. Oraya gideceğiz. O dağ... Aslında bir dağ değil... Aradığımız geminin ta kendisi."
languages.original_text: "It's an easy enough task. Just look for the tallest mountain on the northern continent. That is where we're headed. That mountain... isn't a mountain. It is the very ship we are searching for."

traits.locale_text: "Çantada keklik... Kuzey kıtadaki en yüksek dağı bulmanız yeterli. Oraya gideceğiz. O dağ... Aslında bir dağ değil... Aradığımız geminin ta kendisi o."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
